casebody.data:
Second Department,

January, 1959

(January 5, 1959) In the Matter of Dorothea A. Shearn, as Executrix of Clarence J. Shearn, Deceased, Appellant, against Sidney H. Reich, Respondent.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present— Nolan, P. J., Wenzel, Beldoek, Murphy and Ughetta, JJ.
